short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience Douyin for desktop like never before: Chrome extension that brings exciting and creative content to your screen
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 前所未有地体验桌面抖音：Chrome扩展，为您的屏幕带来激动人心的创意内容

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click open douyin for desktop , browsing screen size is the same as mobile.
